name: Fall-Falls
description:
Fall-Falls is a puzzle game where the objective is to get as many points as possible. You stack houses that fall from the sky to a rock in a acid ocean. 

You controll the rotation of the houses with W and S and where they fall with A and D. It is also possible to control with the arrow-keys.

The game takes place in a dystopian world where companies dumped acid in to the sea. Global warmin made floods sthat covered almost every city. Everything is ruined except for a rock. The survivors are trying to move their houses to the roch but are having some troubles  with making them land corectly, it is your job to make the houses land on the rock.  Good luck!

Music and cover art by: RealFakeName

Programmin and graphics: Mals
